title: Industrial Pressure Vessel
description: Comprehensive design and analysis of a high-pressure industrial vessel, ensuring structural integrity and compliance with ASME boiler and pressure vessel codes.

title: Shell & Tube Heat Exchanger
description: Detailed 3D modeling and thermal efficiency analysis of a custom shell and tube heat exchanger optimized for chemical plant operations.

title: Piping & Equipment Layout
description: Developed an extensive 3D piping layout and general arrangement (GA) drawings for a new manufacturing facility, ensuring optimal workflow and maintenance access.

title: Storage Tank FEA Analysis
description: Conducted finite element analysis (FEA) on a large-scale storage tank to evaluate localized stresses at nozzle intersections and support attachments.

title: Automated Conveyor System
description: Designed a custom automated material handling conveyor system, including sheet metal enclosures and standardized component selection.

title: Custom HVAC Assembly
description: Engineered a specialized HVAC ducting assembly for an industrial cleanroom, balancing airflow requirements with spatial constraints.
